text: John Philip Saklil (20 March 1960 â€“ 3 August 2019) was an Indonesian prelate of the Catholic Church who was Bishop of Timika from 2004 until his death in 2019. Saklil died on 3 August 2019 in Timika at the age of 59. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Indonesian Roman Catholic bishops
